From now on, Jizo will make you
special cylinders.

Meet him in the Goldmund Residential
District, in Avaritia.

The Fire Dragons have taught Homura
their new recipe. You can make it
in the kitchen at either Corrine's
or Tora's House.

As thanks, Mehmed has issued
some requests to the Merc Group.

More Merc Missions with high
Merc Point rewards are now available.

As a follow-up to the matter, Astal
has issued some Merc Group requests.

More Merc Missions which greatly
build Trust are now available.
You've discovered a new Salvage Point.

You can now salvage from Balquors
Ruins in the Cliffs of Mors.

From now on, Silvio will make you
accessories in return for materials.

Check what kinds he can make
by talking to him in person.

You can now make the hat Rugena's
been dreaming of. This will require
using Mei's Field Skill.

Love Source is a pouch item that
greatly increases Trust.

From now on, if you pick more
Flutterheart Grass in Luxuria, you
can make more of the elixir here.

As thanks, Goffredo has issued
some requests to the Merc Group.

More Merc Missions which offer
large rewards are now available.

As thanks, Carsem has issued
some requests to the Merc Group.

More Merc Missions which build

Sisoso has completed work on the
special cylinder.

You can use the Booster Cylinder

Lascham Island.

Sisoso can make you as many
Booster Cylinders as you like.

Jenii will pass on the orders
for Yuou's Just Desserts to the
Merc Group from now on.

More Merc Missions which build
Trust even further, and offer special
pouch item rewards, are now available.

Bring Barhanen the materials and
he'll make Accessories for you.

Gather the Ellook Horns from Ripbik
Ellook, along with any other necessary
materials, then bring them to him.
